theme.name: Morning walk in SoHo, NYC
theme.description: Cobblestone streets, cast-iron buildings, golden morning light

slides.headline: Stop chasing dead leads.
slides.image_concept: Duncan Rogoff (orange hoodie) walking down a cobblestone street in SoHo, NYC. Golden morning light hitting cast-iron buildings in the background. Natural, walking pose. High-end lifestyle photography.

slides.headline: Most owners waste hours manually qualifying.
slides.body: Guessing who to call first is a recipe for lost revenue and burnt-out teams.
slides.image_concept: A low-angle shot of a classic SoHo cast-iron building facade against a clear blue morning sky. Deep shadows and bright highlights on the architectural details.

slides.headline: I built an automation that qualifies for you.
slides.body: It scores every lead, routes high-value prospects to sales, and moves low-intent leads to nurture—automatically.
slides.image_concept: Clean screenshot of an n8n workflow showing a Webhook trigger connecting to several Scoring Logic nodes, branching out to CRM and Slack nodes.

slides.headline: How it works: The Smart Filter.
slides.body: Webhook → Logic Nodes (Score Engagement/Fit) → 1. High Fit (Sales) 2. Med Fit (Nurture) 3. Low Fit (Archive).
slides.image_concept: A clean, minimalist flowchart showing the flow: Inbound Lead -> Scoring Engine (Engagement, Fit, Intent signals) -> Routing paths (Immediate follow-up, Nurture sequence, Archive).

slides.headline: Stop guessing. Start closing.
slides.body: High-value leads get instant follow-up while they're hot. Low-value leads stay out of your inbox.
slides.image_concept: Duncan Rogoff (orange hoodie) leaning against a black cast-iron pillar in SoHo, looking at his phone with a neutral, focused expression. Morning light creating sharp contrast.

slides.headline: Total visibility on lead intent.
slides.body: Built in n8n with CRM routing. No more manual data entry. Just a clean pipeline of qualified opportunities.
slides.image_concept: Close up of Duncan's hand holding a high-end espresso cup at a small outdoor cafe table in SoHo. Cobblestones and the base of a cast-iron building visible in the shallow depth of field.

slides.headline: Comment 'AI' to access all 30 automations.
slides.body: Get the blueprint for this lead scoring workflow and 29 others today.
slides.image_concept: A blurred, high-contrast background of the n8n lead scoring workflow with clean white text overlay.
slides.cta: Comment 'AI' to access 30 of my best automations.
